overview: Sandra is a young modern woman working hard to achieve her goals. She eats healthy and works out, but also takes time to enjoy a nice meal with her close friends and a glass of wine. Strange things start to happen around Sandra's house. She doesn't really notice in the beginning, but that all changes one day.  One day Sandra is out running and she comes by 2 strangers scouting through a window. She yells at them, but they don't respond back. They just turn their head and look. This strange experience comes closer to her and things get more weird around her.
tagline: A young woman embraces herself after a strange experience, but who does she become?
title: Weather Vane
